1.content:

info.brief_description: It is a world where many girls can swallow people whole.
info.description:
Follow the lives of either two different guys or three different girls. It this world about half the world's girls have the ability to swallow people whole. It is common to see guys and girls(who don't have the power) sliding down the gullets of lovely girls and ladies. Girls that have the power can't swallow other girls that have the power, there is something that prevents a swallower from entering another swallower's mouth. Many guys and girls have to avoid being meals for these special girls. The power doesn't appear in girls until the age of sixteen, so it is illegal for girls under the age of sixteen to be swallowed, also it the same for guys, not because they could have the power, it just gives them some time to not have to worry about being gulped. Guys can't have the power.

Rules: Follow them or I will delete. I take no prisoners.
1.)No gay stuff, so only one guy can be in a scene at a time. Before another guy can be introduced into the interactive, the first guy must have either gotten away and left for good, or is swallowed and digested completely, no remains. You can put as many girls in a scene as you want.
2.)The only vore I allow is through the mouth.
3.)No furries, animals, or human-like furries. Just regular human beings. Let's just say no animals, creatures, or mythical creatures of any kind.
4.)The age limits in this interactive are 16 to 28, no younger no older. So this means no mothers. I say this because I have had a guy try to write that a 27 year old teacher had sixteen and eighteen year old daughters.
5.)Editions are to be written in the third person perspective, example: He did his best to escape her hungry belly.
6.)Editions must be at least 6 good sentences long.
7.)Editions must use perfect spelling and grammar, use a word processor like Microsoft Word to check your work.
8.)When making an edition, don't use the title that the site automatically puts in the blank, it just puts in the words from the choice you chose and it usually doesn't fit. Be creative and make your own chapter titles.
9.)If a character is speaking, right the dialog correctly, meaning use quotation marks and punctuation like commas, right. Example:
"Please don't swallow me," Jason said.
Or, for double quotation.
"Please," Sally begged, "Don't eat me."
